explains: v. 把……译成密码（或电码）；给（计算机程序）编码；用外语表达；（基因）对生成（某种物质或行为）负责，给……编码

sentences.en: Failure to encode properly can create annoying situations.
sentences.cn: 无法正确编码可能会带来许多恼人的后果。

sentences.en: Hearing the stories may lead preschoolers to encode aspects of events that allow them to form memories they can access as adults.
sentences.cn: 听故事可能会使学龄前儿童对事件的各方面进行编码，从而形成成年后可以获取的记忆。

sentences.en: And the best way to learn how to encode information meaningfully, Ericsson determined, was a process known as deliberate practice.
sentences.cn: 埃里克森认为，学习如何有意义地编码信息的最佳方法是一种叫做刻意练习的过程。
